title: my bauhaus video
content:
hi guys! i did this 40 sec video on the bauhaus font for my school project. its got a few things in it that dont work but...tell me what you think ? its not a big file 1.3 megs (i think) check it out +

[http://rapidshare.com/files/82170111/ShrijitRajbhandari\_8757\_bauhaus.mov...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123032606/http:/rapidshare.com/files/82170111/ShrijitRajbhandari_8757_bauhaus.mov.html "http://rapidshare.com/files/82170111/ShrijitRajbhandari\_8757\_bauhaus.mov.html")

 [‹ A Bodoni equivalent?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123032606/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40660 "Go to previous forum topic") [Suggest a display face for higher education web site. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123032606/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40507 "Go to next forum topic")
author: subshrijit

comments.content: Why don’t you put this up on the web for us to have a look?
